patterns: Can I enroll at NEU even though Im not a member of the Iglesia Ni Cristo?
Can non INC member enroll in neu
Does non INC enrollee can still enroll in new era university
Is new era accepting non inc member
responses: Yes.New Era University is a non-sectarian instituion of learning; meaning that regardless of religious beliefs, if anyone wants to study in NEU and is ready to follow the rules and regulations implemented here, that person can be accepted as a student. What is important to note is that NEU is known for its rigid discipline, and it is expected that ALL students will follow the discipline implemented herein.

patterns: How much is the tuition fee?
Tuition fee in new era university
How much is the tuition in neu
New Era University tuition fee
responses: Inasmuch as we would want to answer your question here, the answer will depend on what course you will take, how many subjects you plan to enroll in a given semester, and what discounts are to be applied, if any. So, it is best for you to ask our ACCOUNTING DEPARTMENT. You may contact them by calling (02)8981-4221 to 4231 local 3877 or sending an email to accounting@neu.edu.ph

patterns: what is the NEU Mission
responses: NEU MISSION</br></br>- Provide quality education anchored on Christian values with the prime purpose of bringing honor and glory to God.

patterns: NEU Vision
responses: NEU VISION</br></br>- A world-class Institution of learning with a unique Christian culture of excellence, discipline, and service to humanity.

patterns: NEU Goals and Objectives
responses: NEU GOALS and OBJECTIVES</br></br>- Impart value-laden education to the total development of man.</br>- Offer curricula responsive to the needs of the time.</br>- Optimize learning through the adoption and utilization of appropriate instructional methods and resources.</br>- Propel institutional development through the conduct of useful and significant researches.</br>- Extend outreach services which promote self-help in the community.</br>- Promote access to non-conventional higher education and basic education programs.</br>- Develop servant leaders among staff, faculty members, and administrators.</br>- Produce God-fearing, competent, and disciplined graduates.

responses: - Admission Procedure NEU SHS Graduates</br>1. Request for your Temporary Student ID thru sending the following details to admissionrequirements@neu.edu.ph</br></br>- Name: (Last Name, First Name, Middle Name)</br>- Course Applying:</br>- Gender:</br>- Year Graduated:</br></br>2. Once you received the Temporary Username and Password thru email, You can now edit your Personal Information Sheet thru this link https://automate.neu.edu.ph/PARENTS_</br>STUDENTS/parents_student_index.htm NEU Automate for Application</br></br> i. Enter your log-in credentials (username and password)</br> ii. Click Personal Info</br> iii. Click Edit Personal Info</br> iv. Fill-out the General Student Personal Information Sheet (Special characters are not allowed)</br> v. Click Proceed and Print Personal Info then Save/Print as Pdf</br></br> 3. Submit all the followng requirements thru this link https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1b8gPiFVxr</br>y6ep6bjloOQLi5DbubRsLGYxAT0our_vKM/viewform?edit_requested=true Admission Requirements Submission Link</br></br> Admission Requirements for Freshmen</br> - General Student Personal Information Sheet (GSPIS)</br> - PSA Authenticated Birth Certificate</br>  - Senior High School Report Card (F-138) with Graduated Remarks</br> - 2x2 picture with white background</br></br> Admission Requirements for Transferees and Graduate School</br> - General Student Personal Information Sheet (GSPIS)</br> - PSA Authenticated Birth Certificate</br> - Transcript of Records</br> - Honorable Dismissal / Transfer Credential Certificate</br> - 2x2 picture with white background</br></br> 4. Upon receipt of the advice from the College Admissions Office on the Approval of admission, you may now log-in thru this link https://automate.neu.edu.ph/PARENTS_</br>STUDENTS/parents_student_index.htm NEU Automate for Student Enrollment using the log-in credentials (Username and Password) that you have created in filling out your General Information Sheet. </br></br>- Admission Procedure for Non-NEU SHS Graduates</br>1. Fill out the General Personal Information Sheet thru this link https://automate.neu.edu.ph/PARENTS_</br>STUDENTS/parents_student_index.htmNEU Automate for Application</br></br> i. Click NEW USER? CLICK HERE</br> ii. Choose Application Type (Freshmen/Transferee)</br> iii. Click REGISTER</br> iv. Fill-out the General Student Personal Information Sheet (Special characters are not allowed)</br> v. Click PROCEED and take note of the TEMPORARY ID NUMBER, USERNAME and PASSWORD.</br> vi. DOWNLOAD the General Personal Information Sheet by Printing it as PDF file to save it.</br></br> 2. Submit all the following requirements thru this link https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1b8gPiFVxry6ep6bjloO</br>QLi5DbubRsLGYxAT0our_vKM/viewform?edit_requested=trueAdmission Requirements Submission Link</br></br>Admission Requirements for Freshmen</br> - General Student Personal Information Sheet (GSPIS)</br> - PSA Authenticated Birth Certificate</br> -  Senior High School Report Card (F-138) with Graduated Remarks</br> - 2x2 picture with white background</br></br> Admission Requirements for Transferees and Graduate School</br> - General Student Personal Information Sheet (GSPIS)</br> - PSA Authenticated Birth Certificate</br> - Transcript of Records</br> - Honorable Dismissal / Transfer Credential Certificate</br> - 2x2 picture with white background</br></br> 3. Upon receipt of the advice from the College Admissions Office on the Approval of admission, you may now log-in thru this link NEU https://automate.neu.edu.ph/PARENTS_</br>STUDENTS/parents_student_index.htm Automate for Student Enrollment using the log-in credentials (Username and Password) that you have created in filling out your General Information Sheet.</br></br>- Tertiary Enrollment Procedure</br> STEP 1 ADVISING</br></br> - Log in to SchooAutomate (https://automate.neu.edu.ph).</br>- Click Parents/Students. </br>- New Students : Use your TEMPORARY ID Number as LOGIN ID and PASSWORD.</br>- Old Students : Use your Username and Password.</br>- Click the Enrollment tab then Online Advising.</br>- Click Schedule to choose the schedule and then click PROCEED.</br>- Click Save and Take note of the assessment of fees and amount to be paid.</br></br>STEP 2 PAYMENT </br></br>- Proceed to https://payment.neu.edu.ph for payment instruction.</br>- The PROOF OF PAYMENT must be submitted within 24 HOURS from the time Online Advising/Reservation was done.</br></br>STEP 3 COM / OR</br></br>- For OLD STUDENTS,please chech your School/Automate account. If payment has been posted, your enrollment is confirmed and you will see a copy of your Certificate of Matriculation in the Fees Paid during Enrollment tab. </br>- For NEW STUDENTS, upon receipt of a copy of you officical receipt (OR), please take notes of your permanent student ID number (20-xxxxxx-xxx) located on the upper part.</br>- Please use this Student ID number including hypens as username and password to access your School Automate account.</br></br>STEP 4 START OF CLASSES </br></br>- Follow NEU Website Media Accounts for advisory on the start of regular/online classes.</br></br>- Foreign Students</br>1. Certificate of Eligibility</br> </br>Provide Certificate of Eligibility to study in the Philippines from Department of Education</br></br>2. Letter of Intent</br></br> (1) For INC Member - Certificate of Membership</br>(2) For NON-INC Member - Letter of Intent from the applicant and Endorsement Letter from the INC member and a Local Resident Minister of INC Locale nearest to applicant's residence attesting to his/her being good and law abiding citizen.</br></br>3. Scholastic Records/Transfer of Credentials</br></br>Submit Scholastic Records/Transfer of Credentials duly authenticated by the Philippine Consulate General or Philippine Embassy with English Translation, if written in other foreign language SEEN and NOTED stamp is not acceptable)</br></br>4. Authenticated copy of Good Moral Certificate (from previous school)</br></br>5. 2x2 Identical ID Pictures</br> </br>Six (6) copies of 2x2 Identical ID Pictures white background with printed name and signature of applicant at the back.</br></br>6. Birth Certificate of Applicant</br></br> (1) If born abroad with foreign citizenship - Birth Certificate duly authenticated by the Philippine Consulate General or Philippine Embassy</br> (2) If born abroad with Filipino Parent/s - Philippine Statistics Authority Report of Birth,</br> (3) If born in the Philippines with Filipino Parent/s - Birth certificate duly authenticated by the Philippine Statistics Authority (PSA)</br></br>- IS-K to Grade 10 New Student Admission & Enrollment</br> 1. To apply for admission, please click this application form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeWg</br>qgelVYgyXujiA4mcWkphb_0inUZdRc7jl85pH7vz8zIBg/viewform, fill up all the necessary information and upload admission requirements (Students/Pupils Progress Report card (F-138), PSA Birth Certificate and latest ID photo). Upon submission, you will receive an email notification confirming receipt of your application and requirements.</br></br>2. Upon receipt of advise from the Integrated School Admissions Office on the approval of admission and assessed amount of matriculation fees, proceed to https://payment.neu.edu.ph for payment instructions.</br></br> 3. Upon confirmation of your payment, you will receive through email a copy of your Official Receipt (OR) and Certificate of Matriculation (COM).</br></br> 4. For NEW STUDENTS, your permanent student ID number (21-xxxxx-xxx) can be found on the upper part of the OR or on the COM.</br></br> 5. Please use this student ID number (INCLUDING HYPHENS) as username and password to access your SchoolAutomate account (https://automate.neu.edu.ph-> PARENTS/STUDENTS)</br>After logging in, create your own login ID and password. Make sure that this is successful. Log in using the new login ID and password. Login ID will have NEU as prefix. IMPORTANT: Please take care to remember your Login ID and password.</br></br> 6. Follow NEU website for advisory on Start of Classes</br></br>- IS-SHS New Student Admission & Enrollment></br>1. To apply for admission, please click this application form https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSd1UgKh</br>DFSmY4TqkhGtKfPp3uCAYqQKSbqKrrLcgFLGaXz92g/viewform, fill up all the necessary information and upload admission requirements (Students/Pupils Progress Report card (F-138), PSA Birth Certificate and latest ID photo). Upon submission, you will receive an email notification confirming receipt of your application and requirements.</br></br>2. Upon receipt of advise from the Integrated School Admissions Office on the approval of admission and assessed amount of matriculation fees, proceed to https://payment.neu.edu.ph for payment instructions.</br></br>3. Upon confirmation of your payment, you will receive through email a copy of your Official Receipt (OR) and Certificate of Matriculation (COM).</br>For NEW STUDENTS, your permanent student ID number (21-xxxxx-xxx) can be found on the upper part of the OR or on the COM. Please use this student ID number (INCLUDING HYPHENS) as username and password to access your SchoolAutomate account (https://automate.neu.edu.ph-> PARENTS/STUDENTS)</br>After logging in, create your own login ID and password. Make sure that this is successful. Log in using the new login ID and password. Login ID will have NEU as prefix.</br></br> 4. Follow NEU website for advisory on Start of Classes
